name: Punta Cometa
description: Southernmost point of Oaxaca state, dramatic peninsula with 180° ocean views. Popular sunset viewing spot.
address: 20-30 min hike from Mazunte town center

name: Playa Rinconcito
description: Primary beach in Mazunte. Golden sand, calm waters, perfect for swimming. Main social hub with restaurants.

name: Playa Mazunte
description: The local/quieter beach, less crowded. About 1km long crescent bay. Good for yoga retreats.

name: Playa Mermejita
description: Wild, undeveloped beach with black sand. Popular for surfing. Turtle nesting grounds.
address: 20-30 min walk from Mazunte town center

name: Centro Mexicano de la Tortuga
description: Sea turtle conservation center. Features outdoor tanks with different turtle species.

name: Mazunte Center
description: Main town center of Mazunte

name: Hridaya Yoga
description: Popular yoga studio and retreat center with multiple halls (Nitya, Anugraha)

name: Meditation Station
description: Wellness center offering meditation, yoga, and workshop space

name: Bliss Haven
description: Wellness center and event space

name: Semanawak Temazcal & Yoga
description: Temazcal (sauna) and yoga classes

name: Solstice Yoga Center
description: Yoga studio offering classes and instruction

name: Aquadanza
description: Ecstatic dance and movement classes

name: Holistic Center
description: Various healing therapies: craniosacral, massage, ceremonies

name: Cometa Café
description: Best coffee on Oaxaca coast. Good WiFi and working space

name: El Armadillo
description: Moroccan-inspired cuisine. Vegetarian options

name: La Tertulia
description: Beachfront restaurant. Famous for shrimp tacos and fresh sushi

name: DOBA
description: Creative healthy dishes, smoothies, salads. Organic ingredients

name: Luz del Sol
description: Vegan/vegetarian cafe. Veggie breakfasts and lunches

name: La Empanada
description: Pizzeria and pasta. Open 4pm-11pm

name: Tribu Mazunte
description: Gourmet tacos, vegan/veggie options, bowls, pastas

name: Umami Cafe
description: Healthy dishes, smoothies. Starlink WiFi

name: El Gecko
description: Smoothies and juices. Good for co-working

name: El Tiburón Juice Bar
description: Fresh smoothies, juices, açai bowls

name: Casa Davan Bistro
description: Great menu, sandwiches, poke bowls. Starlink WiFi

name: Falafel el Loco
description: Falafel and Mediterranean cuisine

name: Jardin De Sabores
description: Poke bowls and healthy options

name: Antojitos La China
description: Mexican street food and antojitos

name: Cenzontle
description: Hamburgers and craft beers. Also offers art classes

name: Cosméticos Naturales de Mazunte
description: 100% natural cosmetics cooperative. Shampoos, soaps, oils
address: Av. Paseo del Mazunte, Esq. Ocotillo

name: Yu'gupa
description: Health food market. Superfoods, organic greens, vegan treats

name: DaVan Mystique Boutique
description: Clothing, handmade jewelry, natural skincare

name: SOMA Alquimía & Arte
description: Handmade items, art, local crafts

name: Hotel Noga
description: Hotel in Zipolite area. Hosts yoga and wellness events

name: Posada del Arquitecto
description: Popular accommodation and event venue

name: Casa Corzo
description: Event and yoga venue

name: Foro Escénico Alternativo Mermejita
description: Alternative scenic forum/performance space for dance and movement

name: Musicalli
description: Music studio/venue on dirt road between Mazunte and Ventanilla
address: Calle Cantares n7 (Calle Agua de Luna), Mazunte

name: El Chiringuito
description: Beachfront restaurant and bar

name: Wamba
description: Restaurant with Sunday dance sessions (bailación)

name: La Galera
description: Dance and event venue in Zipolite

name: Kinam
description: Event and workshop venue
address: Al lado de Posada la Huerta, Camino Al Alguaje S/N, Mazunte

name: Camp
description: Event and gathering space in Zipolite

name: San Agustinillo
description: Nearby beach town east of Mazunte

name: Zipolite
description: Nearby beach town west of Mazunte. Famous for its nudist beach
